org.apache.reef.tang.formats

Class AvroConfigurationSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.tang.formats.AvroConfigurationSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationSerializer

    public final class AvroConfigurationSerializer
extends Object
implements ConfigurationSerializer
    (De-)Serializing Configuration to and from AvroConfiguration.

    This class is stateless and is therefore safe to reuse.
